txt.en: 'You are looking for more sellers for the auction? I have a necklace which I am nearly done with and almost ready to sell. It is crafted of Warg-teeth. Dunlendings who wear them are powerful and demand respect from all around them, whether they retrieved the teeth themselves or not.\n\n'There is one last tooth which I need to finish this necklace, then it will be ready for sale. On the rock to the east is a powerful Warg, larger than the rest, called Hormgrat. His tooth shall be the centrepiece of this necklace. Bring it to me, and I shall sell in your auction.'
'With this, my necklace will be noticed by everyone. You will command respect and power when you wear it. I will come to your auction.'
'No other tooth shall do. It must be that of the most powerful Warg on the rock. With that, I can command any price I wish.'
Warg-teeth necklaces are highly valued as a symbol of strength in battle and power among the Dunlending clans.
Hormgrat can be found at the Hound's Rest to the east of Avardin.\n\nCadvan asked you to get him a tooth from the most powerful Warg on the rock to the east.
Cadvan is in Avardin in the central Starkmoor.\n\nCadvan will be eager to place the Warg's tooth into the necklace.
